item.title: Netflix Takes New Swing With Japanese Rights to 2026 World Baseball Classic
item.description: Netflix is said to be interested in securing new Major League Baseball rights, but these games weren’t of the sort anyone was expecting. The streaming giant has snared rights to stream the 2026
